moderationRules.name: Spam Detection
moderationRules.description: Detect repetitive messages, excessive caps, or message flooding
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message is spam - repetitive text, excessive caps (>70%), message flooding, or meaningless character spam. Be lenient with excited messages or normal emphasis.

moderationRules.name: Toxicity & Harassment
moderationRules.description: Detect toxic behavior, harassment, personal attacks, and bullying
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message contains harassment, personal attacks, bullying, or toxic behavior directed at other users. Friendly banter and sarcasm should NOT be flagged. Only flag genuinely harmful content.

moderationRules.name: Slurs & Hate Speech
moderationRules.description: Detect racial slurs, hate speech, and discriminatory language
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message contains racial slurs, hate speech, or discriminatory language targeting any group. This is the most serious violation.

moderationRules.name: NSFW Content
moderationRules.description: Detect sexually explicit content, gore, or other NSFW material
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message contains sexually explicit content, references to gore, or other NSFW material. Mild innuendos or jokes should NOT be flagged unless they are very explicit.

moderationRules.name: Threats & Violence
moderationRules.description: Detect threats of violence, doxxing, or real-world harm
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message contains genuine threats of violence, doxxing threats, or intent to cause real-world harm. Video game violence references and obvious jokes should NOT be flagged.

moderationRules.name: Scam & Phishing
moderationRules.description: Detect scam links, phishing attempts, and suspicious URLs
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message contains scam links, phishing attempts, fake giveaways, or suspicious URLs designed to steal information. Normal link sharing should NOT be flagged.

moderationRules.name: Excessive Self-Promotion
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message is primarily self-promotion or advertising (YouTube links, Twitch streams, server invites). Occasional sharing is fine - only flag excessive or spammy promotion.

moderationRules.name: Raid Detection
moderationRules.description: Detect coordinated raids or mass join attacks
moderationRules.aiPrompt: Check if this message appears to be part of a coordinated raid - identical messages from new accounts, mass spam, or coordinated attacks on the server.
